description: CSS file for styling the Tic Tac Toe frontend application with theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned text, background color, and responsive design features.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo including size and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application that holds content and styles for layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with hover effects and responsive adjustments.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframe animation for spinning the App logo.
